objective: Topic/Issue/Problem  Topic/issue/problem is clearly stated – 1 mark (KC)  Topic/issue/problem accurately describes the project – 1 mark (KC)
specific_objectives: Topic/Issue/Problem  Topic/issue/problem is clearly stated – 1 mark (KC)  Topic/issue/problem accurately describes the project – 1 mark (KC)

section: module on: the Online Registration System
objective: Objectives  Objectives are clearly stated and linked to the topic/issue/problem – 1 mark (A)  Objectives are realistic – 1 mark (A)
specific_objectives: linked to the topic/issue/problem – 1 mark (A)  Objectives are realistic – 1 mark (A)

section: module on: the Online Registration System
objective: Background/Overview  Includes a description of the topic/issue/problem - Description includes the history – 1 mark (KC) - Description includes the development – 1 mark (KC)  Establishes the need for research - Why/how is the topic/issue/problem important to student – 1 mark (A) - Impact of topic/issue/problem on society – 1 mark (A)
specific_objectives: Background/Overview  Includes a description of the topic/issue/problem - Description includes the history – 1 mark (KC) - Description includes the development – 1 mark (KC)  Establishes the need for research - Why/how is the topic/issue/problem important to student – 1 mark (A) - Impact of topic/issue/problem on society – 1 mark (A)

section: module on: the Online Registration System
objective: Methodology  Data collection instrument clearly described – 1–2 marks (KC)  Data collection instrument appropriate for type of data – 1 mark (A)  Included at least two instruments of data collection – 1 mark (A)  Method of data collection clearly described – 1–2 marks (A)  Method of data collection adequately justified – 1–2 marks (IA)  Limitations of data collection method clearly stated – 1–2 marks (A)
specific_objectives: Methodology  Data collection instrument clearly described – 1–2 marks (KC)  Data collection instrument appropriate for type of data – 1 mark (A)  Included at least two instruments of data collection – 1 mark (A)  Method of data collection clearly described – 1–2 marks (A)  Method of data collection adequately justified – 1–2 marks (IA)  Limitations of data collection method clearly stated – 1–2 marks (A)

section: module on: the Online Registration System
objective: Presentation and Analysis of Data  Data is presented an appropriate form using tables, charts, graphs – 1–2 marks (KC)
specific_objectives: Analysis of Data  Data is presented an appropriate form using tables, charts, graphs – 1–2 marks (KC)

section: module on: the Online Registration System
objective: Conclusion  Conclusion succinctly summarises the project – 1–2 marks(A)  Conclusion is logical and based on findings – 1–2 marks (A)
specific_objectives: Conclusion  Conclusion succinctly summarises the project – 1–2 marks(A)  Conclusion is logical

section: module on: the Online Registration System
objective: Recommendation  Recommendations are realistic and informed by findings – 1–2 marks (IA)  Recommendations contribute to a better understanding of the topic/issue/problem –1–2 marks (IA)
specific_objectives: informed by findings – 1–2 marks (IA)  Recommendations contribute to a better understanding of the topic/issue/problem –1–2 marks (IA)

section: module on: the Online Registration System
objective: Bibliography Bibliography contains names of authors, name of publisher(s), names and dates of publication, and are written in alphabetical order – 1 mark (KC)
specific_objectives: Bibliography Bibliography contains names of authors, name of publisher(s), names
are written in alphabetical order – 1 mark (KC)
